revision.text:
<languages/> <translate> <!--T:1--> {{Infobox dungeon |name = Mina's Houseboat |image = [[File:Mina's Houseboat.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Mina's Houseboat. |tokens = 1,150,000 |location = Inside Seafolk Village }}
<!--T:2--> '''Mina's Houseboat''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Alola]]. The [[Gyms#Alola|Fairium-Z]] [[File:FairiumZ.png|30px]] is awarded upon clearing this dungeon. It initially has 125 tiles arranged in two floors: 10x10 and 5x5 in size, respectively; including 15 chest tiles, 36 non-boss encounter tiles, 1 ladder tile, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 16,217,412 HP.
== Encounter Tables == <!--T:3-->
===Wild Encounters=== <!--T:4-->
